MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML4 postcode area of Bellshill, affecting properties in Flanigan Grove and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.03pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Bellshill Cross substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.34pm on Saturday 27th February 2021.
